stanza.line: The forward violet thus did I chidechide
Sweet thief whence didst thou steal thy sweet that smellssmells

In my love veins thou hast too grossly dyeddyed
The lily I condemned for thy handhand
And buds of marjoram had stoln thy hairhair
The roses fearfully on thorns did standstand

And to his robbery had annexed thy breathbreath
